title: HMCL启动器进入存档后闪退
author: LostInNowhere
txt_content: 游戏版本是1.14.4版本，楼下附上crash report

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
LostInNowhere 发表于 2020-3-10 14:42
报错前更改了mc本体jar文件里的皮肤文件
删除核心里的META-INF文件夹试试

replies.author: LostInNowhere

replies.author: LostInNowhere
replies.txt_content: 报错前更改了mc本体jar文件里的皮肤文件

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
不要用过修改核心的方式更换皮肤。

参照这个更换皮肤吧 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-827231-1-1.html

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
java.lang.SecurityException: SHA-256 digest error for assets/minecraft/textures/entity/alex.png
修改核心翻车

replies.author: LostInNowhere
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-10 14:48
不要用过修改核心的方式更换皮肤。

replies.author: LostInNowhere
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-3-10 14:45
删除核心里的META-INF文件夹试试
有用，可以进入存档了
